title: Spezza scores 3, tops McDavid's 1st as Stars beat Oilers 4-2
text:
Published By: USATODAY.com: NHL - Today 
Spezza gets hat trick to overshadow McDavid's 1st NHL goal, Stars beat Oilers 4-2 ...
